review:
Dr. Kalyani is very professional. *** ***** *** ******* **** ***** She is very friendly and gives the right advises for the best dental care. She is very prompt in her time management, and won't make any patients to wait.

I would strongly recommend anyone with dental issues to consult Dr.Kalyani *** *** **** ************** *************

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
They are very friendly and experienced in treatment. Me and family all together went for treatments. We all are so happy. Mostly its Worth for what we are spending.Trustful doctors in treatment. As per my feelings we are so happy and will suggest this dental care to all my frds and relatives also if they have any dental problems. Charges are less compare with market and quality of treatment is more than what we are paying. I went for keeping caps which costing was More than 50k, but Dr.Kalyani suggest me cosmetic instead of caps and did the same for me, which was costing very less. Normally in hospitals they look for more bill. But here myself is ready to spend more than 50k but Dr. Kalyani explained very patiently about differences of caps and cosmetic treatment and completes my treatment in 10k. Which shows there sincerest and honesty towards treating patients. 
I am very happy and I will rate them 10 out of 10.
Excellent, friendly. I did scaling, fillings, root canal treatment, tooth extraction. I believe this demonstrates the trust from their treatments.
Charged INR 2300 just to re-fix the teeth cap, which got out of the position accidentally. Very high price to do that job. Regret visiting them

review: It was a wonderful experience visiting smile dental. Doctor was very humble and explained the situation in detail. I am very happy and satisfied with the treatment. Thank you doctor.
